short_description.en: The Energy Savings Assistance Program (ESA), offered to income-qualified customers, provides energy-saving improvements at no charge.
Make home more comfortable with energy efficient improvements and by purchasing Energy StarÂ® certified appliances.
Rebate for the costs of purchasing and installing one or two Level 2 charging stations, including the electric panel if an upgrade is needed.
$0.15/sq ft Rebate for attic insulation. Minimum requirements of R-30 or R-19 for attics with less than 24 in clearance. No new construction.
$0.15/sq ft Rebate for wall insulation. Minimum requirements of R-13. No new construction.
$1,000/ton for a central heat pump.
$1,000/ton for a ductless mini split heat pump.
Up to $1,500 for a heat pump water heater.
Up to $200 for a heat pump clothes dryer.
Up to $500 for an electric range with induction or electric cooktop.
Up to $750 for upgrading your electric panel to support new electric appliances, EVs and solar. Must contact BWP to determine qualification.
Purchase a new electric bicycle (e-bike) and you may be eligible for a cash rebate between $100-$300.
$200 rebate on E-bike purchase cost $1,000 - $1,999.99.
$50 rebate on purchase of new ENERGY STAR-certified electric clothes dryer in current residence.
Earn up to $1,500 when you upgrade your electric panel.
Earn a rebate up to $500 after the installation of a new level 2 Electric Vehicle Charger.
$500 rebate for income qualified AMP customers installing solar in their homes.
Earn up to $6,000 as a rebate for purchasing a used electric vehicle.
Earn up to $1,500 for switching from natural gas to an electric heat pump.
Earn up to $1,500 when you install a qualifying electric heat pump water heater.
Earn up to $200 for replacing your clothes dryer with a new, ENERGY STAR Certified heat pump clothes dryer.
$400 rebate when replacing your water heater with a new, ENERGY STAR certified heat pump water heater.
Up to $3,000 rebate on eligible UL Certified energy storage system. Must participate in NEM 2.0.
$0.10 per sq. ft. rebate for exterior wall insulation (R-13+).
$1 per sq. ft. rebate for ENERGY STAR Certified windows.
$1 per sq. ft. rebate for qualified window film.
50% of repair cost (Up to $300) rebate for air duct repair.
$200 per ton rebate for a qualified ductless mini-split heat pump.
$200 per ton rebate for a qualified ducted heat pump. Minimum 15+ SEER rating.
$50 rebate for ENERGY STAR Certified smart thermostat.  Maximum of two.
Rebates for installation costs and upgrades of Level 2 EV chargers. Up to $500 for non-program participants and up to $1,000 for networked chargers with enrollment in time-based rates.
$0.35 per square foot rebate for new fire resistant attic insulation.
Up to $2,300 rebate for residents who replace an existing water heater with a new, efficient, electric heat pump water heater.
Up to $10,000 rebate available to help cover the costs incurred for infrastructure upgrades directly related to EV charger installations.
Earn a $250 per ton rebate up to 100% of the cost to purchase and install a new qualifying ducted heat pump.
Earn a $250 per ton rebate up to 100% of the cost to purchase and install a new qualifying ductless heat pump.
Earn up to $50 as a rebate for the purchase and installation of a new qualifying smart thermostat to replace an existing non-connected, manual, or programmable thermostat. Limit two per household.
Save up to $500 on heat pump water heater replacing an electric water heater.
Up to $1599 rebate for installing an electric vehicle charging station with electric panel upgrade.
Earn $300 as a rebate for a new e-bike purchase.
Up to $250/ton rebate for an ENERGY STAR Heat Pump / Mini-Split Pump.
Up to $325 rebate for an ENERGY STAR electric heat pump clothes dryer.
Up to $525 rebate for an ENERGY STAR electric heat pump water heater.
Up to $220 rebate for an ENERGY STAR electric clothes dryer.
Up to $50 rebate for an electric leaf blower.
Rebate up to $2/sq ft for Energy Star certified dual-pane windows.
Rebate up to $0.30 /sq.ft. for Energy Star attic insulation.
Earn up to $200/ton for a ductless mini-split system. Minimum 17.1 SEER2 and AHRI certified. Must use participating contractor.
Up to $300/ton rebate for HVAC system. Minimum HSPF2 6.7. Must use participating contractor.
Up to $400/ton rebate for switching HVAC from gas to electric. Minimum HSPF2 7.2. Must use participating contractor.
Up to $35 rebate for electric Energy Star certified clothes dryer.
Up to $350 rebate for a hybrid-heat pump Energy Star certified heat pump water heater.
Rebate for up to 50% of the cost for an air source heat pump.
Rebate for up to 50% of the cost for a qualified Geothermal Heat Pump.
Rebate for up to 50% of the cost for a qualified ENERGY STAR certified Smart Thermostat. Maximum $50.
Income qualified customers are eligible to receive free weatherization upgrades.
Up to $500 rebate for new stationary Induction Range or Cooktop.
Rebate for qualified new replacement windows.
Up to $50 rebate for a new, ENERGY STARÂ® certified Smart Thermostat.
$100 rebate up to 50% of the cost of installing an ENERGY STAR certified electric clothes dryer.
Up to $200 rebate up to 50% of the project cost for installing a ENERGY STAR Hybrid/Heat Pump Water Heater.
Rebate for qualified new attic insulation upgrades.
Rebate up to $250/ton for a new qualifying air source heat pump.
$150 up to 50% of duct sealing costs for homes with central ducted air conditioning or heat pumps with excessive leakage of conditioned air.
Rebate of $2 per sq ft for Energy Star certified residential windows while supplies last.
Rebate up to $1,500 for a qualifying Level 2 EV charger and EV meter.
Rebate up to $1,500 per unit for an ENERGY STARÂ® qualified heat pump water heater.
$400 rebate available for income-qualified residents who purchase a level 2 charger while funds last.
$500 rebate for replacing a gas or electric water heater with a heat pump water heater.
Earn between $500 - $1,000 rebate for replacing a gas or electric HVAC system with a heat pump HVAC or mini-split system.
Up to $75 instant rebate for purchase and installation of an ENERGY STAR certified Smart Thermostat.
$300 rebate for qualified customers for backup power support.
PG&E will provide one free Level 2 charger valued at $500.
Up to $2,000 per single-family household for panel upgrades completed by the programâs licensed electricians, Synergy Companies. Income qualified.
$3/watt incentives to install an onsite solar system and energy efficiency training.
Up to $500 rebate per charger for Level 2 electric vehicle charger. Limit two per household.
$450 rebate per unit for central heat pump with Tier 1 rating.
$700 rebate per unit for central heat pump with Tier 2 rating.
$350 rebate per unit for ductless mini split heat pump.
$50 rebate per unit on a new ENERGY STAR Smart Thermostat to replace eligible thermostats on a central heating and cooling system.
$0.17 per square foot rebate up to $850 for attic insulation.
$100 rebate per unit for induction cooktop / range replacement.
$500 rebate per unit for ENERGY STAR certified heat pump storage water heater.
$1 rebate per square foot for sun screens.
$1 rebate per square foot for window films.
$2 rebate per square foot for ENERGY STAR replacement windows.
Up to $400 cash back when you upgrade to a heat pump water heater.
$50 cash back after purchasing a qualifying Smart Thermostat.
Up to $2500 cash back for converting an electric resistance heating system with a ductless heat pump.
Upgrade your homeâs exterior wall insulation and receive up to $0.10 per square foot.
Upgrade your homeâs ceiling insulation and receive up to $0.10 per square foot.
Receive a $50 rebate when you purchase and install a smart thermostat in your home.
Receive a $500 rebate when you purchase a new, high-efficiency electric heat pump water heater.
Receive a $300 rebate when you purchase a new, high-efficiency electric heat pump clothes dryer.
Receive a $1,000 rebate when you upgrade your existing electric panel to a new electric panel that is 200 amps or higher.
Up to $500 rebate for the purchase and installation of a a new ENERGY STAR certified Hybrid/Heat Pump Water Heater.
Up to $350 per ton for the purchase and installation of a new qualifying air source heat pump. Rebate amount varies based on system efficiency.
$600 per ton for the purchase and installation of a new ENERGY STAR certified ground or water source heat pump, up to 50% of the total project cost.
$500 rebate for replacing a gas-powered vehicle with a plug-in electric vehicle.
Get up to $115 in bill credits when you participate in energy events after enrolling in the Smart Energy Program.
$1,000 rebate for the purchase or lease of a pre-owned EV.
$4000 rebate for income-qualified applicants for the purchase or lease of a pre-owned EV.
Up to $1,000 rebate for a new electric panel upgrade. Must be new and be a minimum of 200 amps.
$1,000 rebate to replace a gas unit with an electric heat pump water heater.
$750 rebate to replace an electric unit with an electric heat pump water heater.
Up to $950 for installing a qualifying electric vehicle charging station at home.
Up to $750 in rebates on energy-efficient electric heat pump heating and cooling system upgrades installed by a qualifying contractor.
Up to $3,500 rebate when you replace a gas system with an energy-efficient electric heat pump heating and cooling system by a qualifying contractor.
Up to $750 rebate for replacing your existing cooktop/range with a qualifying ENERGY STAR certified induction cooktop/range.
Up to $3,000 for upgrading your water heater with a qualifying heat pump water heater.
Up 10% rebate for the purchase of an electric bicycle (e-bike), up to $300.
$500 rebate for the installation of an electric heat pump water heater if replacing an electric resistance water heater.
$1,000 rebate for the installation of an electric heat pump water heater if replacing an electric resistance water heater.
Up to $550 rebate for the installation of an electric vehicle charging station.
Qualified homeowners can enroll in the free solar PV system and receive $3.75 per watt, up to 3 kilowatts DC to cover the costs of the system.
$2,000 rebate for upgrading your electric panel to a smart panel.
Rebate up to $400 for a heat pump water heater.
Get up to $250 when you replace your gas range with an induction range or cooktop.
$0.75 / sqft rebate (not to exceed $1,000 per home) for attic insulation.
$0.70 / sqft rebate (not to exceed $1,000 per home) for wall insulation.
Get $150 cash back on air sealing when you work with a BayREN Participating Contractor.
Get $500 cash back on duct replacements when you work with a BayREN Participating Contractor.
Get $400 cash back on a heat pump installation when you work with a BayREN Participating Contractor.
Get $250 back on your high efficiency heat pump clothes dryer when replacing an existing natural gas clothes dryer.
Earn up to 20 Â¢ per sq. ft. on attic insulation replacement.
Earn 15 Â¢ per sq. ft. on exterior wall insulation replacement.
Earn $1 per sq. ft for installing Energy Star Certified windows/glass doors.
Earn $1 per sq. ft for installing NFRC certified window film.
Earn $1 per sq. ft for installing qualifying solar window screens.
Receive a $200 rebate for purchasing an Energy Star-rated electric heat pump dryer.
Receive a $200 rebate for purchasing an Energy Star-rated electric heat pump water heater.
Up to $1,000 rebate for a used Battery Electric or Plug-In Hybrid vehicle if purchased or leased after January 1, 2023.
Up to $500 rebate for installing a Level 2 (240-Volt AC) plug-in charger at home in eligible locations.
Up to $805 rebate for installing a Time-of-Use (TOU) EV Rate Meter.
$0.30 per sq. ft. rebate for qualified new wall insulation upgrades.
